definitions.definition: A repeating firearm with three or more barrels grouped around a central axis .
A buttress at one side of the court in the game of fives .
A tower capped by a cupola , looking similar to a giant pepper shaker.
Any of the buildings of the Royal Academy and National Gallery in Trafalgar Square, London, having cupolas on the roof.
definitions.label_groups: architecture , slang , chiefly in the plural

secondary_definitions: ( firearms ) A repeating firearm with three or more barrels grouped around a central axis .
A buttress at one side of the court in the game of fives .
( architecture ) A tower capped by a cupola , looking similar to a giant pepper shaker.
( architecture , slang , chiefly in the plural ) Any of the buildings of the Royal Academy and National Gallery in Trafalgar Square, London, having cupolas on the roof.
